RumorFact.Text: The missing cat might be in Dim Thorn. It is a small Bramble seed in the furthest orbit of this star.

ExploreFact.Text: I sent my Little Scout inside Dim Thorn. It appears to be bigger on the inside! (Also, we are just going to ignore the black sphere under the sun).

RumorFact.Text: Sending my Little Scout into Dim Thorn results in a duplicate signal originating from some point in space, but I don't see anything there.

ExploreFact.Text: I discovered a hidden Node that also leads into Dim Thorn's pocket dimension. It is hidden with some sort of cloaking field. Good thing I can mark the location of this ship log entry!

RumorFact.Text: There is some sort of object inside Dim Thorn's pocket dimension that may be of Nomai origin.
I can reach the vessel by entering the Hidden Node.

ExploreFact.Text: I have arrived at a downsized vessel. Entering it might be a bit of a tight squeeze, but it should be possible.
The corridor in the downsized vessel is blocked by cacti. If only I had some sort of cactus removal device...
Using the Cactus Teleporter, the corridor can be unblocked.
After the corridor that was blocked with cacti is a room with a Hearthian recorder and a Nomai recorder.
Leuc, the cat owner I have been helping, has somehow reached this room before me. They took a miniature cactus as their pet cat.
Due to poor planning, the Nomai could not escape the vessel and were all killed by cacti.
